channel.title: Images on VitaminDWiki
channel.description: Recent content in Images on VitaminDWiki

item.title: WHO analysis of optimal UV - 2006
item.description:
Environmental Burden of Disease Series, No. 13 Solar Ultraviolet Radiation

Global burden of disease from solar ultraviolet radiation

Robyn Lucas, Tony McMichael, Wayne Smith, Bruce Armstrong - 2006

Many subsequent UV publications by Robyn Lucas Such as:

  • Lucas, R & Neale, R 2014, ‘What is the optimal level of vitamin D? Separating the evidence from the rhetoric’, Australian Family Physician, vol. 43, no. 3, pp. 119-122.

  • Gatenby, P, Lucas, R & Swaminathan, A 2013, ‘Vitamin D deficiency and risk for rheumatic diseases: an update’, Current Opinion in Rheumatology, vol. 25, no. 2, pp. 184-191.
